name: Cargo Bridge Moon HD
description:
Before heading to Mars with Elon Musk, we need to train our skills somewhere closer. So let’s go to the Moon!

People have started colonizing the Moon and building bridges on its rocky surface is even more challenging than on Earth. Collect all items in each level, use portals, avoid bees (...what? Bees are everywhere, aren’t they?) and have fun!

Key features:
- 20 brand new levels on the Moon
- new types of cargo
- new gameplay elements like tricky portals

More games coming soon!

Published and distributed by Software Planet Group Ltd. with permission of Limex Games.
